text:
Hi 
We had a couple of cases in November. Once we blocked the rollout of the new
Teams client (Teams admin panel), there were no more cases of Teams
disappearing, so yes, it may be related with: 
* The roll out of the new Teams client by Microsoft or used-initiated +
 * possible conflicts with the one being deployed to Windows 1x by Microsoft +
 * the Microsoft Store for Business being almost non-functional +
 * the public Microsoft Store blocked per policy. 
We will see next year how to test and deploy the new client. 
Best regards 
Seve 
Von:  <
%40DBBP189MB1340.EURP189.PROD.OUTLOOK.COM

metadata.subject: AW: [patchmanagement] Teams Uninstalling itself
metadata.email_text_original:
You don't often get email from juan.severino@skan.ch. Learn why this is
important [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
Hi 
We had a couple of cases in November. Once we blocked the rollout of the new
Teams client (Teams admin panel), there were no more cases of Teams
disappearing, so yes, it may be related with: 
* The roll out of the new Teams client by Microsoft or used-initiated +
 * possible conflicts with the one being deployed to Windows 1x by Microsoft +
 * the Microsoft Store for Business being almost non-functional +
 * the public Microsoft Store blocked per policy. 
We will see next year how to test and deploy the new client. 
Best regards 
Seve 
Von: patchmanagement@googlegroups.com <patchmanagement@googlegroups.com
